resources.string: I forgive and release the past and look forward to the future
I am not in danger; I am just uncomfortable; this too will pass
I can do anything I set my mind to
All I need to succeed is within me
I am growing and learning every day
Itâ€™s okay to leave my comfort zone
I deserve to feel good about myself
Every challenge I overcome is a success
I let go of limiting beliefs and choose to trust myself
